matchzy.ready.markedready.en: You have been marked as ready.
matchzy.ready.markedready.chi: 你已被标记为准备就绪。

matchzy.ready.markedunready.en: You have been marked as NOT ready.

matchzy.pause.pausedthematch.en: {green}{0}{default} has paused the match. Type .unpause to unpause the match.
matchzy.pause.pausedthematch.chi: {green}{0}{default} 暂停了比赛。输入 .unpause 以继续比赛。

matchzy.pause.teamsunpausedthematch.en: Both teams have unpaused, resuming the match!
matchzy.pause.teamsunpausedthematch.chi: 双方队伍都已解除暂停，比赛继续！
